title: Give a girl the right pair of shoes . . . And she can conquer the world!
description: Writer and self-confessed shoe addict, Stephanie Connolly, documents her own personal conquests in this real-life, modern-day fairytale, complete with Love, Tragedy, Battles and Happy Ending’s.Situations such as the tragic loss of her baby boy, her battles with anxiety and depression and her survival of a horrific assault are peppered with heart-felt, comical and witty stories amongst Steph’s own perceptions of life as a 21st century woman. Expect tears of joy and sorrow, laugh-out-loud moments, charm and honesty amongst the pages of Stephanie’s memoirs as she proves that given the right pair of shoes a girl really can conquer the world . . .
author: Stephanie Connolly
